text: Loyola Marymount University (LMU) is a private university in Los Angeles, California. The school has over 10,000 undergraduate and graduate students. It is the largest Catholic university on the west coast of the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Panorama of historic St. Vincent's College, Loyola's original 1887 campus in downtown LA. Category:Colleges and universities in Los Angeles Category:1865 establishments in the United States Category:1860s establishments in California
title: Loyola Marymount University
